pages.text: Cultivated from a bush so bouyant that, as more cloud berries sprouted, it would eventually tear itself from the ground.$(br2)Tying the bushes down is no longer required, but the berries still float like feathers when dropped.$(br2)Used in spells and rituals associated with the sky, $(l:herbs/cloud_berry#renew)it is also a renewable crop$().

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: As an elemental herb, it requires one of the five forms of $(l:resources/elemental_soil)elemental soil$() to grow on.  Can grow on any of the Elemental Soils. $(br2)Otherwise, it grows in the same way as any other crop would, and is ripe when clusters of white cling to thin strands of green growth that sway even without a breeze.
